Package ru.rusetskii.cashmachine.cash_operation

Class CashStorage

java.lang.Object
ru.rusetskii.cashmachine.cash_operation.CashStorage
public class CashStorage extends Object
Represents storage of Cash Machine and provides working methods. Simple Cash Machine Dispenser should implement the following functions:
  • Banknotes deposit;
  • Banknotes withdrawal.
Author:
Nikita Rusetskii

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CashStorage()
    Creates new HashMap object to store cash information in the format of <Currency, DenominationStorage> so it allows extracting denomination storage by the currency

  • Constructor Details

    • CashStorage

      public CashStorage()
      Creates new HashMap object to store cash information in the format of <Currency, DenominationStorage> so it allows extracting denomination storage by the currency

  • Method Details

    • deposit

      public void deposit​(String currency, int denomination, int amount)
      Adds banknotes of the specified denomination to the cash storage if currency exists or creates new denomination storage and then adds banknotes
      Parameters:
      currency - the currency code
      denomination - banknote denomination
      amount - cash amount
      See Also:
      DenominationStorage

    • withdraw

      public DenominationStorage withdraw​(String currency, int amount)
      Returns new denomination storage which represents the amount of money that were withdrawn

      Method subtracts one banknote of the biggest denomination and adds this banknote to the copied denomination storage. If there are no banknotes of the given denomination, methods removes denomination from the cash storage.

      Parameters:
      currency - currency code
      amount - amount of cash to withdraw
      Returns:
      amount of cash withdrawn

    • getCashByCurrency

      public DenominationStorage getCashByCurrency​(String currency)
      Returns denomination storage by the given currency
      Parameters:
      currency - currency code of the banknotes to return
      Returns:
      banknotes of specified currency

    • getCurrencies

      public Set<String> getCurrencies()
      Returns set of all currencies stored in cash storage
      Returns:
      set of currencies

    • containsCurrency

      public boolean containsCurrency​(String currency)
      Returns true if currency is found in the storage
      Parameters:
      currency - the currency code to check
      Returns:
      true if currency exists in the cash storage; false otherwise.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks storage for emptiness
      Returns:
      true if empty; false otherwise.

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns size of the cash storage
      Returns:
      cash storage size
